'''''sanya''''' also ''[[vorosanya]]'' in [[Quenya]] means "regular, law-abiding, normal" .
==Etymology==
Earlier *''thanya'' from [[PQ]] *''stanjâ'', [[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[STAN]].<ref>{{VT|46}}</ref>
==See also==
*''[[senya]]'' ("usual")<ref name=VT49>{{VT|49a}}, p. 22</ref>
